page.title: 16NEWTON STEWART_PAGEANT TIME
page.content: {The Galloway Pageant}is held every year in the summer.There are many festivities before and after the pageant.The floats mainly depict local historical events. They assemble before going down the main street to Dashwood Square.The{Queen of Galloway is crowned by the previous queen and both make a speech. Another speech is made in which it is said that the Galloway Pageant will go on as long as the River Cree flows.The fancy dress parade is judged at the cinema. {Creetown Silver Band}and{Stranraer {District Pipe Band}often supply music. There is a window competition at pageant time.You have to find an object in the shop window which is not sold by the shop.The first prize is Â£50.
